name: Thunderstrike - Raijin
text: While you control no monsters you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only Special Summon "Thunderstrike - Raijin" once per turn this way. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 Thunder type monster from your hand or a "Thunderstrike" Spell/Trap from your hand; draw 1 card, and if you do, return this card to your hand.
